original: intros m x x' Hinv Hplanar Hdlink. split. - intros Hexpf. generalize (disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1 m x x' Hinv Hplanar Hdlink). unfold not. intro H. apply H. auto. - intro Heqc. generalize (double_link_comm m x x' Hinv Hdlink). intros [Hneq H]. rewrite -> Br1_comm; try auto. rewrite <- Heqc. apply disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1; try auto. intros Contra. apply Heqc. rewrite Br1_comm in Contra; try auto. rewrite <- Contra. auto.
